| **Sulfur Dioxide (SO₂)** | Sulfur in coal → oxidation | Converts to sulfate aerosols (a component of PM₂.₅) and irritates airways. |

Because of these advancements, the direct health risks from SO₂ emissions have been greatly mitigated in developed nations.
